summary: Adds Redguard Knight Armor to Lorecraft
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6]LORECRAFT[/size][/b]
[size=4]
REDGUARD KNIGHT ARMOR
CONTENT PLUGIN

[/size]
[size=4]
[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft 3.0+ [/url]
by ArcaneSmith

[color=red]REQUIRES[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13500] Redguard Knight Armor [/url]
by hothtrooper44


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/search.php?name=lorecraft&scid=&author=&mname=&desc=&size1=&size2=&downloads1=&downloads2=&udate1_day=&udate1_month=&udate1_year=&udate2_day=&udate2_month=&udate2_year=&ldate1_day=&ldate1_month=&ldate1_year=&ldate2_day=&ldate2_month=&ldate2_year=&endorsements=&images=&readme=&adultonly=&opensource=&page=1] ALL RELEASED CONTENT PLUGINS HERE[/url]
[/size]

[size=3]Create your own content plugin: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=50375] GET THE GUIDE HERE[/url][/size][/center]



[b][size=3] FEATURES[/b][/size]
[list]

[*] Adds 3 books, the light version, the heavy version, and one for the scimitar
[*] Armors and scimitar shows in Steel category instead of Misc
[*] They benefit from Steel Smithing enhanced upgrade
[*] Books sold by the Arcane Smith npc (Skyforge)


[b][size=3] INSTALLATION[/b][/size]


[*] Install required mods
[*] Replace Redguard Knight Armor\'s esp with this esp

[/list]

[b][size=3]WHAT\'S LORECRAFT?[/b][/size]

Check [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959] Lorecraft\'s Core page [/url]
And here\'s an interview at [url=http://www.skyrimforge.com/announcements/mod-interview-with-arcane-smith-lorecraft] Skyrim Forge [/url]



[b][size=3]COMMENTS/BUG REPORT[/b][/size]

Post them [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9959]here[/url]
author: ArcaneSmith
